chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_61
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
for ANC and delivery:
a. If you identify any symptoms of complications
b. If you identify the following from previous obstetric history:
 ∙ Stillbirth or neonatal loss
 ∙ Three or more spontaneous consecutive abortions
 ∙ Obstructed labour
 ∙ Premature births, twins, or multiple pregnancies
 ∙ Weight of the previous baby <2500 g or >4500 g
 ∙ Admission for hypertension or pre-eclampsia/eclampsia in the previous pregnancy
 ∙ Surgery on the reproductive tract
 ∙ Congenital anomaly
 ∙ Treatment for
